code: import{useCallback}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import*as AuthActions from'../store/Auth.slice';export default function useAuth(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var user=useSelector(function(s){return s.auth.user;});var fetching=useSelector(function(s){return s.auth.fetching;});var fetchUser=useCallback(function(userId){return dispatch(AuthActions.fetchUser(userId)).unwrap();},[dispatch]);return{user:user,fetching:fetching,fetchUser:fetchUser};}
